data.title: Crown Princess Giovanna of Bulgaria
data.meta_description: Giovanna, Crown Princess of Bulgaria is the wife of Boris, Crown Prince of Bulgaria and the current Crown Princess of Bulgaria. She is the daughter of Victor Emanuel III and his wife Queen Elena who were both the former King and Queen of Italy before the end of the Weltkrieg in which the two...
data.text:
History[]

Early Life[]

Giovanna was born in Rome, the third daughter and fourth child of King Victor Emmanuel III of Italy and Queen Elena, former Princess of Montenegro. Upon her Roman Catholic christening, she was given the names Giovanna Elisabetta Antonia Romana Maria. Her older brother was the future Italian Crown Prince Umberto of Italy.

After the Weltkrieg[]

WIP

Marriages[]

She had married Boris, Crown Prince of Bulgaria and she was accepted as his wife due to her mother being a Slavic woman. She married Boris and had one child with him, a three year old daughter named Marie Louise, Princess of Koh√°ry (b. 1933).
